name: Die: 6
description:
Submitted for the Nokia 3310 Jam 2! 

You are a die. Other game pieces are evil. Don't ask me why.

When you, well, die, it isn't always a bad thing. When you die, your value goes up by one. Your value is multiplied by your score at the end of the level.

But there can be too much of a good thing. If your value goes over six, it goes back to one, and you have a limited number of lives.

What's the highest score you can get through six randomly selected levels?

Controls:

Move : WASD or Arrow Keys.

Shoot/Confirm: Space or Enter

(You can use a gamepad but it hasn't been tested)
